alert.note: Alert for Gove (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 7:11PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gove County through 745 PM CST... At 711 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Gove, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Gove County. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 98 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
